thread.title: Twitter Names Omid Kordestani as Executive Chairman
thread.title_full: Twitter Names Omid Kordestani as Executive Chairman

title: Twitter Names Omid Kordestani as Executive Chairman
text:
Published By: NYTimes Business - Today 
Mr. Kordestani previously worked at Google, and Twitter’s chief, Jack Dorsey, called him a “proven and experienced leader.”...
